Put Emperor: Battle for Dune soundtrack here.

Follow these steps to extract the tracks from the original game CDs:
1. Download and install DuneEx from https://dune2k.com/Duniverse/Games/Emperor/Downloads/Editors
2. Open the MUSIC.BAG files of each house-CD (discs 2-4) in DuneEX and extract the tracks.

Make sure, file-names are exactly as listed below.

List of files:

Atreides Disc (Disc 2):
AT_Map1.mp3
AT_Menu1.mp3
AT_Score1a.mp3
(AT02)Sand_Excursion.mp3
(AT03)Assembling_the_Troops.mp3
(AT04)The_Spice_Must_Flow.mp3
(AT05)The_Overseer.mp3
(AT06)Battle_of_the_Atreides.mp3
(AT08)Infiltrating_HK.mp3
(AT09)Unsuspected_Attack.mp3
(AT10)Fremen_Alliance.mp3
(AT11)Assassination_Attempt.mp3
(AT12)Fight_in_the_Dunes.mp3

Harkonnen Disc (Disc 3):
HK_Map1.mp3
HK_Menu1.mp3
HK_Score1.mp3
(HK02)Surrounded.mp3
(HK03)Tribute_to_Evil.mp3
(HK04)Harkonnen_Force.mp3
(HK06)Unstoppable.mp3
(HK07)Dark_Alliance.mp3
(HK08)War_for_the_Spice.mp3
(HK09)Defenders_of_Arrakis.mp3
(HK10)House_Harkonnen.mp3
(HK11)Invincible.mp3
(HK12)Victory_is_Inevitable.mp3

Ordos Disc (Disc 4):
OR_Map1.mp3
OR_Menu1.mp3
OR_Score1.mp3
(OR02)The_Strategist.mp3
(OR03)House_Ordos.mp3
(OR04)Ghola.mp3
(OR05)Executronic.mp3
(OR06)Deception.mp3
(OR07)Sabotage.mp3
(OR08)Dream_of_the_Executrix.mp3
(OR10)Ordos_Control.mp3
(OR11)The_Specimen.mp3
(OR12)Infiltrators.mp3
